results.title: Sent by God
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: the return from Egypt of Mary, Joseph and the Child; Jesus’ bar mitzvah in the synagogue; Jesus is lost and found among the doctor’s in the temple; John preaches at Jordan; the Zealots discuss John’s mission; Jesus is baptized by John; Andrew and Philip follow Jesus.

results.title: Born for us
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: Joseph and Mary’s arrival in Bethlehem; the birth of Jesus; the census in Bethlehem; the gifts of the Magi; Herod’s rage and the killing of the Innocents and the flight to Egypt.

results.title: The Awaited Messiah
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
This is the beginning of the story of the life of Jesus Christ, from the betrothal of Mary and Joseph; the Angel visits Mary; the wedding of Mary and Joseph and the unrest of young zealots.

group_works.title: The Haunted huntress. Night of the leopard
group_works.creator_credit: Owen Newman, Amanda Barrett, Keith Scholey, National Geographic Society and BBC

results.title: The Haunted huntress. Night of the leopard
results.creator_credit: Owen Newman, Amanda Barrett, Keith Scholey, National Geographic Society and BBC
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World of wildlife”.
Narrated by David Attenborough, “The Haunted huntress” looks at the changing fortunes of a cheetah mother and her cubs as they attempt to survive the harsh environment of Kenya’s Masai Mara. “Night of the leopard” reveals the amazing nocturnal world of a leopard mother and her cubs as she battles with lions, hyenas and crocodiles.
results.title_for_label: The Haunted huntress. Night of the leopard
results.creator_credit_for_label: Owen Newman, Amanda Barrett, Keith Scholey, National Geographic Society and BBC

group_works.title: The Black death, 1361
group_works.creator_credit: Leo Eaton, Altug Savasal, Diane Holmes and Maryland Public Television

results.title: The Black death, 1361
results.creator_credit: Leo Eaton, Altug Savasal, Diane Holmes and Maryland Public Television
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Timeline”.
A dramatic recreation of the social upheaval experienced in the Middle Ages due to the spread of the Black Death. Modelled on a news broadcast, the program looks at the causes and impact of the Plague, and “interviews” key historical figures of the time. At its most virulent, the disease decimated both city and rural populations and created severe labour shortages.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Leo Eaton, Altug Savasal, Diane Holmes and Maryland Public Television

results.title: The Lottery
results.creator_credit: Larry Yust and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Short story showcase”.
An adaptation of Shirley Jackson’s chilling story about a small American town and its annual lottery ritual. Explores the concepts of violence and tradition, highlighting their senselessness in our time. Suiable for upper secondary level.
